TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Ray_Allen, title = Ray_Allen, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ray_Allen} }

S.FORM: == Ray Allen == nalecuhan i 7 bulad 20 demiad, 1975 a mihca, Ray Allen, u miunduay ciniza. Ray Allen unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u misimaw zikuzay mimaliay, u mikilac zikuzay mimaliay. Ray Allen nalecuhan i Merced, California, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Ray Allen i 1996 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka cacay ku uwac atu silsil lima, namapili' tu nu Minnesota Timberwolves putiput. kakuniza

== Ray Allen == nalecohan i 7 bolad 20 demiad, 1975 a mihca, Ray Allen, o miondoay ciniza. Ray Allen ono syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o misimaw zikozay mimaliay, o mikilac zikozay mimaliay. Ray Allen nalecohan i Merced, California, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Ray Allen i 1996 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka cacay ko owac ato silsil lima, namapili' to no Minnesota Timberwolves potipot. kakoniza
